name: Beat Balls: The magic loop
description:
Make a ball, Start a loop, Create a Rhythm.

Nod yourself to the rhythm as you play Beat Balls: The Magic Loop - A game about balls and a never ending loop of melodies.

Each tap create a ball, a ball running in loop will create a beat. Get your timing wrong and the balls will make a mess. But if you get it right, the loops and the beats will create a rhythm; a complete, joyous and satisfying melody that will help you relax your mind and soothe your soul.

Featuring:
Simple tap control, easy to play.
Numerous songs to satisfy different taste.
Futuristic graphic and effect that will create a novel experience.
70+ challenging level to satisfy your puzzling needs.
Various skin for your looping balls.

So just tap to create a ball, and let the rhythm be your guide.
